storeFrontForm.errorTitle: Can't add payment method to sales channel
storeFrontForm.errorMessage: Configuration PayU is incomplete. Please complete it.

sadboxWarning.title: PayU configuration
sadboxWarning.message: Warning! PayU works in Sanbox mode. Do not accept real payments in this mode.

credentialsError.title: PayU configuration error
credentialsError.message: The PayU access data provided is incorrect. Payment method will not work properly.
